column4: Hi all.  Is there a web page where we can look up package versions in the different Ubuntu releases?  Something like http://packages.debian.org/cgi-bin/search_packages.pl?
Karhuton/icewt: thanks - search at www.ubuntu.com didn't find that.
Is breezy the current stable release?  packages.ubuntu.com doesn't indicate which release is the latest & which is the oldest.
